mapper.select: SELECT A.*, PC.PC_NAME, MIN(PO.PO_DAYPRICE) AS MINPRICE, MAX(PO.PO_MAX) AS MAXPEOPLE FROM (SELECT P.P_NO, P.PC_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.P_BNAME, P.P_IMG, COUNT(RV.P_NO) AS RVCOUNT FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN REVIEW RV ON P.P_NO = RV.P_NO WHERE P.P_CONFIRM LIKE '승인' AND P.P_DELETE = 0 AND (RV.RV_DELETE IS NULL OR RV.RV_DELETE = 0) GROUP BY P.P_NO, P.PC_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.P_BNAME, P.P_IMG) A LEFT JOIN PLACECATEGORY PC ON A.PC_NO = PC.PC_NO LEFT JOIN PLACEOPTION PO ON A.P_NO = PO.P_NO GROUP BY A.P_NO, A.PC_NO, A.P_TITLE, A.P_BNAME, A.P_IMG, A.RVCOUNT, PC.PC_NAME ORDER BY A.P_NO DESC

SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT RV.*, M.M_NICK, M.M_ID FROM REVIEW RV LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON RV.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P_NO = #{param1} AND (RV.RV_DELETE=0 OR RV.RV_DELETE IS NULL) ORDER BY RV.RV_POSTDATE DESC ) A ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN #{param2} AND #{param3}
SELECT * FROM PLACEOPTION WHERE P_NO=#{param1} ORDER BY PO_NO

SELECT A.*, PC.PC_NAME, MIN(PO.PO_DAYPRICE) AS MINPRICE, MAX(PO.PO_MAX) AS MAXPEOPLE FROM (SELECT P.P_NO, P.PC_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.P_BNAME, P.P_IMG, COUNT(RV.P_NO) AS RVCOUNT FROM PLACE P LEFT JOIN REVIEW RV ON P.P_NO = RV.P_NO WHERE P.P_CONFIRM LIKE '승인' AND P.PC_NO=#{param1} AND P.P_DELETE = 0 AND (RV.RV_DELETE IS NULL OR RV.RV_DELETE = 0) GROUP BY P.P_NO, P.PC_NO, P.P_TITLE, P.P_BNAME, P.P_IMG) A LEFT JOIN PLACECATEGORY PC ON A.PC_NO = PC.PC_NO LEFT JOIN PLACEOPTION PO ON A.P_NO = PO.P_NO GROUP BY A.P_NO, A.PC_NO, A.P_TITLE, A.P_BNAME, A.P_IMG, A.RVCOUNT, PC.PC_NAME ORDER BY A.P_NO DESC
